companies.name: Spectrum.Life
companies.description: Personalized wellbeing app providing 24/7 access to counseling, cognitive behavioral therapy, and support for mental health, infertility, elder care, and financial guidance.

companies.name: Carebridge
companies.description: Comprehensive EAP providing 24/7 mental health counseling, certified life coaching, and work-life benefits via telehealth, in-person, phone, and chat platforms.

companies.name: Workplace Options
companies.description: World's largest privately owned integrated employee wellbeing provider offering counseling, coaching, and work-life solutions to 88 million people globally.

companies.name: Modern Health
companies.description: Next-generation EAP platform offering AI-powered provider matching, therapy appointments within 24 hours, and digital mental health tools with 20% engagement rates.

companies.name: Spring Health
companies.description: All-in-one EAP solution matching employees to therapists, coaches, and care navigators for personalized treatment of mental health conditions and substance use disorders.

companies.name: Lyra Health
companies.description: AI-powered mental health platform offering coaching, therapy, and self-care tools with average wait times under 7 days for first therapy appointments.

companies.name: Headspace for Work
companies.description: All-in-one mental health offering combining meditation, therapy, psychiatry, and work-life services with 5-10x higher engagement than traditional EAPs.

companies.name: Virgin Pulse
companies.description: Employee wellbeing platform offering health assessments, mental health programming, team challenges, and integrated benefits navigation with up to 85% engagement rates.

companies.name: Limeade
companies.description: Immersive wellbeing platform integrating physical, mental, social, and financial wellness solutions with personalized content and Microsoft Teams integration.
